project.description:
Scrum 3 Deployment job

Universal across all Canoe Dev/Scrum systems. Parameter Driven. User supplies needed parameters to initiate the deploy job

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: DeployUser
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: Enter the User id and summary of purpose for deployment

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Enter Build Version to Deploy. Build Version of component to be deployed (must be entered as version number + build number ie; 4.0.0_35)

Open SCM Staging Area to discover valid versions to use. If no version is selected the version selection will happen as follows:

  • For DevInt Environment - Existing version will be redeployed
  • For Scrum Environments - DevInt version will be used for version to deploy

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: DB_Rebuild
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: If there is a DB associated with this component, do you want to rebuild from scratch or perform just a liquibase update against the existing schema?

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh export DeployTarg="scrum3" echo "--- Deployment ID: ${BUILD_TAG} - ${BUILD_ID}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Deployment to ${DeployTarg} by ${DeployUser}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "Component: ${Component}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log # Set initial getVer flags to 'No' # getVer="0" # Setup APP/DB specific variables # case $Component in caas-core) export DB_USER="CAAS" export DB_PASS="CAAS" ;; ads-core) export DB_USER="ADS" export DB_PASS="ADS" ;; dai-etl-feeder) export DB_USER="REPORTING_ODS" export DB_PASS="REPORTING_ODS" ;; ops-dt-domain) export DB_USER="OPS_DT" export DB_PASS="OPS_DT" ;; oss_bar) export DB_USER="OSS_BAR" export DB_PASS="OSS_BAR" ;; smsi-publisher) export DB_USER="SMSIPUB" export DB_PASS="SMSIPUB" ;; dai_amm) export DB_USER="AMM" export DB_PASS="AMM" ;; esac # Setup Environment specific variables # case $DeployTarg in devint) export DeployTarg export targname="dvappdai01" export APPSERVER_IP="10.13.18.113" export SIDTarg="dev003" export DBIP="10.13.18.111" export JDBC_URL="jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.111:1522:dev003" export DB_USER="DI_${DB_USER}" export DB_PASS="DI_${DB_PASS}" export ETL_CAAS="DI_CAAS" export ETL_BAR="DI_OSS-BAR" export ETL_BILLING="DI_BILLING" ;; scrum1) export targname="dvappdai02" export APPSERVER_IP="10.13.18.115" export SIDTarg="scrum001" export DBIP="10.13.18.119" export JDBC_URL="jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.119:1522:scrum001" export DB_USER="SC1_${DB_USER}" export DB_PASS="SC1_${DB_PASS}" export ETL_CAAS="SC1_CAAS" export ETL_BAR="SC1_OSS-BAR" export ETL_BILLING="SC1_BILLING" ;; scrum2) export targname="dvappdai03" export APPSERVER_IP="10.13.18.116" export SIDTarg="scrum002" export DBIP="10.13.18.120" export JDBC_URL="jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.120:1522:scrum002" export DB_USER="SC2_${DB_USER}" export DB_PASS="SC2_${DB_PASS}" export ETL_CAAS="SC2_CAAS" export ETL_BAR="SC2_OSS-BAR" export ETL_BILLING="SC2_BILLING" ;; scrum3) export targname="dvappdai04" export APPSERVER_IP="10.13.18.117" export SIDTarg="scrum003" export DBIP="10.13.18.121" export JDBC_URL="jdbc:oracle:thin:@10.13.18.121:1522:scrum003" export DB_USER="SC3_${DB_USER}" export DB_PASS="SC3_${DB_PASS}" export ETL_CAAS="SC3_CAAS" export ETL_BAR="SC3_OSS-BAR" export ETL_BILLING="SC3_BILLING" ;; esac print "${targname}" print "${APPSERVER_IP}" print "${SIDTarg}" print "${JDBC_URL}" # Verify User supplies a Username and Purpose for the Deployment # if [ -z ${DeployUser} ] ; then print "

User must supply a user name and summary of deploy purpose

" exit 1 fi # Check to see if this deployment is intended for the DevInt system and if it is, whether a new or existing version should be used # if [ ${DeployTarg} = "devint" ] ; then if [ -z ${Version} ] ; then getVer="1" print "For DevInt deployments, if no version is supplied, the existing version will be redeployed" fi else # If not a DevInt deploy, check to see if a version is supplied and notify the user that no version will indicate a DevInt version upgrade to the selected Scrum system # if [ -z ${Version} ] ; then getVer="1" print "For Scrum deployments, if no version is supplied, the existing DevInt version will be deployed" fi fi print "${Component} ${DeployTarg} ${Version}" cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts case $Component in ################################################ dai-billing) Deployed_Version=`ssh tcserver@${targname} "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/billing/webapps/dai-billing/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/billing/webapps/dai-billing/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi print "Deploying version: ${Version}" /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} billing stop cd /opt/build/scripts ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a dai-billing -e ${DeployTarg} if [[ ${DB_Rebuild} = "Yes" ]] ; then cd /opt/checkouts/dai-billing/grails-app/migrations/cisys export SQLCONN="(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=${DBIP})(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=${SIDTarg})))" sqlplus -S cm_system/oracle123@$SQLCONN < /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/bill.txt echo "dai-billing-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeplotTarg}/billdb.txt ;; ################################################ dai_amm) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/dai_amm/webapps/dai_amm/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi if [[ ${DB_Rebuild} = "Yes" ]] ; then /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} dai_amm stop ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a dai_amm -e ${DeployTarg} cd /opt/checkouts/dai_amm/grails-app/migrations/cisys export SQLCONN="(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=${DBIP})(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=${SIDTarg})))" sqlplus -S cm_system/oracle123@$SQLCONN < /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/amm.txt ;; ################################################ Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-cm) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/cm/webapps/Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-cm*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a ${Component} -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i cm -v echo "Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-cm-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/cm.txt ;; ################################################ Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-engine) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/ads/webapps/ads*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a ads -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i ads -v ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a ads -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i psn -v ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a cis -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i cis -v echo "Dynamic-Ad-Insertion-engine-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/de.txt ;; ################################################ dai-cip-feedback) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/cip/webapps/cip-server*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a cip-server -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i cip -v echo "dai-cip-feedback-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/cip-feedback.txt ;; ################################################ ops-dce-safi-reporting-agent) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/dce-agent-002/webapps/ops-dce-safi-reporting-agent/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a ${Component} -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i dce-agent-002 -v echo "ops-dce-safi-reporting-agent-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/dce-agent-002.txt ;; ################################################ dai-cip) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "cd /opt/tcserver/dai-cip/cip-batch; jar xf dai-cip-batch.jar META-INF/MANIFEST.MF; grep Implementation-Version META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'; rm -fR META-INF"` fi ssh tcserver@${targname} "cd dai-cip/cip-immediate; ./cipstartstop.sh stop" ssh tcserver@${targname} "cd dai-cip/cip-batch; ./cipstartstop.sh stop" cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./deployjar.sh -a dai-cip -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -v echo "dai-cip-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/cip.txt ;; ################################################ dai-lincoln) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "cd /opt/tcserver/log_splitter; jar xf lincoln-1.2.0.jar META-INF/MANIFEST.MF; grep Implementation-Version META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'; rm -fR META-INF"` fi cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./deployjar.sh -a dai-lincoln -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -v echo "dai-lincoln-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DepolyTarg}/log.txt ;; ################################################ dai-smsi) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/smsi/webapps/safi-smsi-server*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a safi-smsi-server -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -i smsi -r ${Version} print dai-smsi-${Version} > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/smsi.txt print dai-smsi-${Version} > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/smsi_db.txt ;; ################################################ int-test-support) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/mock_svr/webapps/int-test-support/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a int-test-support -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i mock_svr -v echo "int-test-support-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/mock_svr.txt ;; ################################################ ops-dce-scte-cfa-reporting-agent) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/dce-agent-001/webapps/ops-dce-scte-cfa-reporting-agent/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a ${Component} -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i dce-agent-001 -v echo "ops-dce-scte-cfa-reporting-agent-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/dce-agent-001.txt ;; ################################################ ops-dt) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/ops-dt/webapps/ops-dt/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a ${Component} -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i ${Component} -v echo "ops-dt-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/opsdt.txt ;; ################################################ oss_bar) Deployed_Version=`ssh tcserver@${targname} "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/oss_bar/webapps/oss_bar/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/oss_bar/webapps/oss_bar/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` fi print "Deploying version: ${Version}" /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} oss_bar stop cd /opt/build/scripts ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a oss_bar -e ${DeployTarg} if [[ ${DB_Rebuild} = "Yes" ]] ; then cd /opt/checkouts/oss_bar/grails-app/migrations/cisys export SQLCONN="(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=${DBIP})(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=${SIDTarg})))" sqlplus -S cm_system/oracle123@$SQLCONN <oss_bar-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/bar.txt echo "oss_bar-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/bardb.txt ;; ################################################ smsi-admin) if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/smsi-admin/webapps/smsi-admin/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` print "Deploying version: ${Version}" fi cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts ./tmpdeployapp.sh -a smsi-admin -t ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} -r ${Version} -i smsi-admin -v echo "smsi-admin-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/smsi-admin.txt ;; ################################################ smsi-publisher) Deployed_Version=`ssh tcserver@${targname} "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/smsipub/webapps/smsi-publisher*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/smsipub/webapps/smsi-publisher*/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` print "Deploying version: ${Version}" fi /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} smsipub stop cd /opt/build/scripts ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a smsi-publisher -e ${DeployTarg} if [[ ${DB_Rebuild} = "Yes" ]] ; then cd /opt/checkouts/smsi-publisher/config/cisys export SQLCONN="(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=${DBIP})(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=${SIDTarg})))" sqlplus -S cm_system/oracle123@$SQLCONN < /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/smsipub.txt echo "smsi-publisher-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/smsipub.txt ;; ################################################ caas-core) cd /opt/build/scripts Deployed_Version=`./check_dbversions.sh -a caas-core -e ${DeployTarg}` if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`./check_dbversions.sh -a caas-core -e devint` STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then echo "Check version status failed" exit ${STATUS} fi print "Deploying version: ${Version}" fi /opt/build/scripts/roottcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} stop ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a caas-core -e ${DeployTarg} if [[ ${DB_Rebuild} = "Yes" ]] ; then ssh tcserver@${targname} "cd dai-cip/cip-immediate; ./cipstartstop.sh stop" ssh tcserver@${targname} "cd dai-cip/cip-batch; ./cipstartstop.sh stop" cd /opt/checkouts/caas-core/core/model/src/main/resources/liquibase/cisys export SQLCONN="(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=${DBIP})(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=${SIDTarg})))" sqlplus -S cm_system/oracle123@$SQLCONN <Needs update
dai-etl-feeder_${ETL_VERS}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/etldb.txt BAR_VERS=`ssh tcserver@${targname} "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/oss_bar/webapps/oss_bar/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"` echo "Needs update
oss_bar_${BAR_VERS}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/bardb.txt echo "caas-core-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/caas-coredb.txt ;; ################################################ ads-core) cd /opt/build/scripts Deployed_Version=`./check_dbversions.sh -a ads-core -e ${DeployTarg}` if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`./check_dbversions.sh -a ads-core -e devint` STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then echo "Check version status failed" exit ${STATUS} fi print "Deploying version: ${Version}" fi /opt/build/scripts/roottcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} stop ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a ads-core -e ${DeployTarg} if [[ ${DB_Rebuild} = "Yes" ]] ; then cd /opt/checkouts/ads-core/core/model/src/main/resources/liquibase/cisys export SQLCONN="(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=${DBIP})(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=${SIDTarg})))" sqlplus -S cm_system/oracle123@$SQLCONN < /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/ads-coredb.txt ;; ################################################ dai-etl-feeder) /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} report stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} oss_bar stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} smsi stop /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} smsi-admin stop cd /opt/build/scripts Deployed_Version=`./check_dbversions.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -e ${DeployTarg}` if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`./check_dbversions.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -e devint` STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then echo "Check version status failed. Do you need to do a PackageDeploy first?" exit ${STATUS} fi print "Deploying version: ${Version}" fi ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a dai-etl-feeder -e ${DeployTarg} if [[ ${DB_Rebuild} = "Yes" ]] ; then cd /opt/checkouts/dai-etl-feeder/src/main/resources/liquibase/cisys export SQLCONN="(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=${DBIP})(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=${SIDTarg})))" sqlplus -S cm_system/oracle123@$SQLCONN <dai-etl-feeder-${Version}" > /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/etldb.txt ;; ################################################ ops-dt-domain) /opt/build/scripts/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} ops-dt stop /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/groovy/bin/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} dce-agent-001 stop /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/groovy/bin/tcServerAdmin.sh ${targname} dce-agent-002 stop cd /opt/build/scripts Deployed_Version=`./check_dbversions.sh -a ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg}` if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then Version=`./check_dbversions.sh -a ${Component} -e devint` STATUS=${?} if [[ ${STATUS} != "0" ]]; then echo "Check version status failed. Do you need to do a PackageDeploy first?" exit ${STATUS} fi print "Deploying version: ${Version}" fi ./kill_dbsessions.sh -a ${Component} -e ${DeployTarg} if [[ ${DB_Rebuild} = "Yes" ]] ; then cd /opt/checkouts/ops-dt-domain/grails-app/migrations/cisys export SQLCONN="(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=${DBIP})(PORT=1522)))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVICE_NAME=${SIDTarg})))" sqlplus -S cm_system/oracle123@$SQLCONN < /var/www/html/${DeployTarg}/opsdtdb.txt ;; *) print "No Deploy...";; esac if [ ${getVer} = "1" ] ; then echo "Version: ${Version} derived from DevInt by default
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log else echo "Version: ${Version} specified by user
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log fi echo "DB Rebuild: ${DB_Rebuild}
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "URL For Deploy output: console
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "
" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log echo "

" >> /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log mv /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.html /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.tmp cat /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.tmp > /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.html rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${DeployTarg}.tmp rm /opt/build/scm/scripts/buildServer/log/${BUILD_TAG}.log
